div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 2215 Syracuse, Teracati, 1922 (1032) Burial: 215 B.C. (K) Contents: 5+ AR. Possibly 2 hoards found Hieronymus: didr. (ΑΦ, ΚΙ, ΣΩ, ΜΙ) ANS 1944.100.57180 Disposition: Syracuse 4; New York 1 Orsi's notes Currò Pisanò, AIIN 1962-4, p. 225
